format: A data frame with 133 rows and 6 variables:

parameters.quarter:
A categorical vector, quarter in the game, OT stands for
overtime
parameters.vs:
A categorical vector, ORL if the Los Angeles Lakers played
against Orlando
parameters.game: A numerical vector, game in the 2009 NBA finals
parameters.description: A character vector, description of the shot
parameters.time: A character vector, time at which Kobe took a shot
parameters.shot:
A categorical vector, H if the shot was a hit, M if the shot
was a miss

description:
Description
Data from the five games the Los Angeles Lakers played against the Orlando
Magic in the 2009 NBA finals.
title: Kobe Bryant basketball performance
reference:
Each row represents a shot Kobe Bryant took during the five games of the
2009 NBA finals. Kobe Bryant's performance earned him the title of Most
Valuable Player and many spectators commented on how he appeared to show
a hot hand.
